text: Miloš Zeman (; born 28 September 1944) is a Czech politician. He became the third President of the Czech Republic on 8 March 2013. Before he was President, Zeman served as the Prime Minister of the Czech Republic from 1998 to 2002. He describes himself as a "tolerant atheist". In October 2021, Zeman was hospitalized at a military hospital in Prague because of diabetic neuropathy.Czech President in intensive care after holding talks on dramatic election ==References== ==Other websites== *Curriculum Vitae at the website of the Prague Castle * *Miloš Zeman at the website of the Government of the Czech Republic Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Czech Republic Category:Prime ministers of the Czech Republic
title: Miloš Zeman
